Command.label: Command
Command.tooltip: The command that will be responded to.

StreamerUsername.label: StreamerUsername
StreamerUsername.tooltip: The streamer's username. Leave blank if you want people to be able to throw the potato to you!

BotUsername.label: BotUsername
BotUsername.tooltip: The bot's username. If this is not filled out, people can throw the potato to your bot.

SecondsToHold.label: SecondsToHold
SecondsToHold.tooltip: How many seconds the first player has to hold the potato.

TimeDecrement.label: TimeDecrement
TimeDecrement.tooltip: How many seconds each consecutive toss subtracts from the timer. Setting to 0 will cause the game to not speed up.

Permission.label: Permission
Permission.tooltip: Who is able to use the command

Info.label: Info
Info.tooltip: This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission.

Cooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
Cooldown.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for
